responsibilities: Collaborate with project team members to ensure development and implementation of new data-driven business solutions.
Drive development effort End-to-End for on-time delivery of high-quality solutions that conform to requirements, architectural vision, and applicable standards.
Collaborate with senior technical staff and PM to identify, document, plan contingency, track and manage risks and issues until all are resolved.
Present technical solutions, capabilities, considerations, and features in business terms.
Effectively communicate status, issues, and risks in a precise and timely manner.
Coach and mentor junior team members and evolve team talent pipeline.
qualifications: Strong technical knowledge and leadership skills.
Hands-on experience with cloud technologies and AI/ML production systems.
Knowledgeable about business drivers and emerging AI/ML trends.
Experience with AWS and GCP services.
Strong interpersonal skills and excellent written and verbal communication.
Ability to manage complex projects and deadlines.
Expertise with IaC solutions (Terraform, CloudFormation, etc.).
Expertise in programming languages such as Golang, Java, Rust, and C/C++.
Expertise in cloud architecture and service offerings.
Experience in Cloud Big Data Services.
Experience in Cloud AI/ML solutions and tools such as AWS Sagemaker, Comprehend, GCP AutoML, AWS EKS, ElasticCache, CloudWatch.
Strong cloud security and best practices for cloud infrastructure management.
analysis: The job responsibilities and skills listed do not explicitly mention Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs). The responsibilities focus on collaboration, development, risk management, and mentoring, while the skills emphasize technical knowledge, cloud technologies, AI/ML production systems, and cloud architecture. Although there is mention of AI/ML trends and tools such as AWS Sagemaker and GCP AutoML, these are general AI/ML tools and do not specifically indicate work with GenAI or LLMs. The job seems to be more focused on cloud-based AI/ML solutions and infrastructure rather than specifically on generative models or language models.
